tasks.task_description: Set up project structure with Maven/Gradle build configuration for Java 21
Create core engine foundation with GameEngine main loop and StateManager
Implement Entity Component System (ECS) architecture with sealed interfaces
Design and implement RenderEngine with LWJGL3 integration
Create InputManager for keyboard and mouse handling
Implement AudioManager for sound effects and background music
Build ResourceManager for asset loading and caching
Create tile-based map system with collision detection
Implement camera system with smooth following and transitions
Design sprite animation system with frame management
Create player character controller with 4-directional movement
Implement NPC system with basic AI behaviors
Build dialogue system with branching conversation trees
Create turn-based battle system with initiative and actions
Implement character stats and leveling system
Design inventory management system
Create save/load system with JSON serialization
Implement map transition system between areas
Build UI system for menus, inventory, and battle interfaces
Create configuration system for game settings
Implement performance optimizations (sprite batching, culling)
Add debugging tools and developer console
Create comprehensive unit tests for core systems
Write technical documentation and API reference
Perform integration testing and bug fixes

description: Comprehensive 2D top-down RPG game engine development in Java 21 for single-player PC games like EarthBound/Pokemon
context: Starting implementation of the demo. Setting up Maven project structure with Java 21 configuration.
